entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023
